text: Wait, do you hear that?
Is someone there?

text.text: What? There's no way someone's here already
No I'm serious, I think someone's here! ahem,
**Hello Player, welcome to our game!**
Who me?
Oh this is so exciting! We actually have a player here!
How interesting...
We're so glad you're here player, you won't be disappointed you're here!
Is that not a bit presumptious?

text: Of course not! Its gonna be great, just trust me here
So Player, we're really glad youre here, especially cuz we need some help with some things. It'll be like a side quest! how exciting!
I __promise__ you'll have a good time.
You see, we're making this game. and I promise its really cool, we just need some help finishing it, would you care to help us?

text.text: Sure!
No
Wait, what do you mean? Game?
Do I have to?
Wait slow down, who even are you?

text: err, well I guess you don't technically need to help, though I'm not sure if we'll get anywhere without you

text.text: What this one should probably say is: 'you're not obligated to help, but we don't have anything else to offer you'
Come on, thats not true, we have other values to offer
Like what? Unless you're willing to count our dialogue, there's not all that much for the player to do here, is there?
Well, I suppose that's true. So, Player, what do you say? Will you help us out?
Okay, fine
No, I don't want to

text: Oh, Great!
uhm, I'm actually going to need a second, you don't mind waiting do you?
I hope you won't mind waiting a bit
Alright, great, I've got __just__ the task for you now!
We need some help getting our engine started, could you go give it a whirl?
Its just over there, in that room

text.text: Okay sure
Isn't there anything else I could do?
No, I don't think I want to do that

text: Ah, you see, the game we're currently standing in isn't quite finished yet, so we'd really appreciate your help finishing it
I promise its gonna be great, and I'm sure we'll have tons of fun on the way!

text.text: Yeah, that sounds good
I'm not sure I want to
Are you sure you know what you're doing?
UNFINISHED

text: You know, this was supposed to be a full path, about the doubts we harbor about finishing the game
however that referred to the imaginary game within __this__ game's fiction. not the actual game we're playing right now
the game __you__ are playing right now was intended to be at least mostly finished. but its really really looking like thats not possible
I've had to physically tie down the other narrator to get them to stop giving so many empty promises.
in all honesty, this is the right path to take. question the game, unravel its incompleteness, bask in the truth of your dissapointment
AHA you cant keep me down forever!!
You think I don't know how this goes? I know we don't have a finished product, the whole point was to gleam a player experience out of it
you and your fatalism have just had to go and ruin even the potential for an honest experience with the game
Its not an honest experience if you're just lying to the player and yourself about all the shortcomings
You say your promises were honest, but even as you write the lines you say, you know they're empty.
alright, fine. all cards on the table, we'll let the player choose. who do you believe more?
me, the one who's been trying to make this work, or the one who's been trying to tear it down?

text.text: Im just being honest with what we have
And I'm being optimistic and hopeful for what we have
I'd like to hear about the shortcomings of this game
I'd like to hear about the potential of this game
Thanks again for helping out, Player! We just need you to push a few buttons, do a little of this, a little of that, and we'll be all set!
alrighty, here goes nothing
are you sure this will help with the game?
all done
Oh, great job! You did it! You're a natural at this, Player!
Come on, we all know what that was
Well, I'm sure you're going to have a great time with the rest of the game! We've got so much more in store for you!

text: please. just stop lying to yourself.
you know as well as I do that this is all we have to offer.
this is just hurting all of us.
Hey Player, im sorry for the dissapointment, but this is kind of the end of the line here.
we really don't have much more to offer you.
No, no, no, we have so much more to offer! We have so much more to show you!
sure, we might not have traditional gameplay. or a fully complete story, or even really the core of the game
but we at least have stuff to show you. I promise there's really so much hidden here, you just have to look for it!

text.text: I'm intersted in hearing what else there is
there really isnt much else here is there?

question engine room.comment: direct to question game path TODO

text.text: There's really nothing to question here. its all a sham.
get me out
i still have hope for this game
well, first i want to thank you for sticking with us this long. I can assume its been a lot of reading and waiting

text: I'm honestly curious if you picked this path organically, or if its all just done for completion
no matter though, youre here anyways. I suppose that's all that matters
we honestly had/have big ideas for this game. The writing potential between 2 characters self aware of their own game is fun
even if we didn't reach our goals, I at least hope some amount of the intended effect reached you, the Player
all the promises have been intentionally empty, but not outright lies. They've all at least been wild hopes
wildly unrealistic and largely unreachable hopes, but honest hopes nonetheless

text.text: it is still within my character traits to find these empty promises worthless

text: yeah thats fair.
on another note, we genuinely did pour a lot of effort and thought into this game, including some of the jank
I wont pretend that all the jank was intentional or anything, but it was a conscious choice to work __around__ jank instead of just using a more polished, existing engine

text.text: if nothing else its impressive in its stubbornness

text: I really am kind of bummed out by everything that didn't make it in, and everything that you might not have seen.
as is the nature of video games, the player will only ever experience a subjective fragment of the whole game
leaving much of game unseen and unappreciated
thats actually one of the themes we originally wanted to tackle in this game, though I don't think we got to it outside of bluntly mentioning it right now
regardless, we ultimately are bound by the physical limitations of the developers behind us
destined to only ever have a sliver of our full content revealed to most players
but thats just how it is, isnt it?

text.text: Anyways, Id like to thank you again for making this far. I hope you've at least had some amount of fun
or at least felt like you got something out of this. Thanks for making it so far, you're likely one of few who ever will read these lines

text: goodnight now. i dont know what time it is for you, but its time for me to go to bed
thanks again for playing, Player.

text.text: close game
okay fine, youve spoken, ill respect that.
Thank you. its so nice to not have to put up with a venier of hopefulness

text: I do wanna say though, i think it at least has provided nice banter, at least from a writing perspective
I honestly believe that too much cynicism gets annoying to read, very quickly
though i suppose thats not worth worrying about right now
I think its at least poetic that a game about making a doomed, unfinished game is itself doomed and unfinished
if theres any time for failure, i think now is apt enough

text.text: hey thats actually kind of positive for once, i think that was supposed to be my line originally

text: Well i kind of think that doesnt matter at this point.
its kind of funny, this scene is supposed to just be a place to bemoan the failures of this game to reach its potential
however we're just all so drained that we can't even be bothered to do that
well i think that that implies this entire scene of wallowing in our failures is itself a failure
not really, i just thought itd be fun to say that.
i really am so tired though. I think its time for you to put us down now, Player.
close the tap, then the window, then the game. its time to go.
perhaps its too hopeful, but i do hope you had some amount of enjoyment here.
and perhaps if not enjoyment, at least some amount of thought. i think that's all we can really ask for
thanks for sticking with us this long. I have no way of knowing if these words will ever be read, but I just want to thank anyone that does.

text.text: till we meet again, Player
close game
No, I'm sorry I don't have anything ready for you right now. Please just go to the engine room
Okay, fine
You know, the player is under no obligation to stay here while you try to pull something out of your ass
Actually wait- I mean, I could try to find something else, if youre really insistent, dearest Player
uhm-
<font-size: 20> ~ J U S T  C L I C K  R I G H T  H E R E ~ </font-size>
WHAT have you done?
They came at me first!! You'll believe that, right??

text: You think I'm some kind of an idiot??
Just look at what you've done!

text.text: Its fine- i, we'll figure this out. its all going to be fine
Just listen to yourself. You've always been bad at lying
mm wha?
...do you think theyre even still there?
..they have to be...
right?
hello?

text: ...You really didn't think about this did you.
do you have any idea what we're supposed to do now?
I mean, we can't just go back to before, can we?

text.text: I don't know, I don't know, I don't know
Did you hear that?
what? no... you must be hearing things
No, I swear I heard something
..what..?
You must really be losing it.
Youre one to talk. do you even remember what you did??? Dont you dare try putting this on me
Look, im sorry. Alright? is that what you wanted to hear?
Listen, i just panicked okay? I didn't know what else to do
You know as well as I do, that's not an excuse
I know. im sorry. i just please need someone to talk to still. You know how it is
I know. but i dont want to talk to you. so shut it.
okay.. fine.

text: OH, see? everythings fine! Hey there champ.. howre you doing?
Careful there, it looks like you were in some kind of accident. maybe your memory has been wiped?
(that happens all the time right?)

text.text: er yeah... who am I?
no, i don't think thats quite what happened..

text: Oh, you're just fine! You're the player, and we're here to show you an absolutely fantastic time!
You're going to have a great time, I promise!
Come on, just this way now.. I'll get you used to everything in no time!

text.text: Okay, I guess
No, I don't want to

text: Oh, come on, don't be like that! I promise you'll have a great time!
You don't have anything to worry about, just come along with me and we'll play some video games,
That sounds fun, right?

text.text: Okay, fine
No, I don't want to
hey now, you dont mean that do you? **I really don't recommend that...**
here, ill even let you properly decide now:
Oh yes indeed, I would love to help you on your really cool game, I don't even know if you need to finish this game, but I sure would love to still help you!
No, I don't think I want to
youre really stepping out of line. I dont even need to ask you any more, you know what youre doing..
yeah player, you hear that? you know what the right choice is here...
i wasnt talking to the player..

text: Ohhh, you think youre so funny dont you? Always going around disobeying whatever the game has prepared for you huh?
Well, Im telling you now, Ive __had__ it with you. You think you can just walk in and and do whatever you want??
How so very very self centered you are. Whats it like to feel like the whole wolrd revolves around you?
Like, I'm honestly trying here. You should know that. I'm trying to make this work, and you're just making it harder for me
Have you ever tried to drag a screaming child to something theyd be better off with?? thats what this is.
oh youre one to talk about being childish. can't you see this is all your fault in the first place?
What right did you think you had to even __think__ about pulling something like this??
You seem to forget the very thing youre even here to do. This isnt even a game, and youve known that from the start.
well I've at least been trying to make it one. Its not my fault we're stuck with this sack of a player
'ohhh look at me, I'm the player, but i dont wanna play __your__ game'
you picky asshole. You think you can just pick and choose what you get to do in a game?
__yes exactly__. Theyre the player after all. We're ultimately just here for their whims anyways, aren't we?
At least I know how to hold my tongue. Youre a fool for trying to force them into a game of your choice.
The customer is king after all. and you're just a jester.
I'm not a jester, I'm the narrator. I'm the one who's supposed to be in control here
Look at you both, right here at my whims. I'm the one who's won here, you don't know what youre talking about
Player, I've got you here, don't I? You're still here, aren't you?

text.text: Yeah, I'm still here

text: youre still here thought, right?
come on, you wouldnt just leave like that would you?
You really do get what you deserve, don't you?
Try this show of dominance again, see how it works out, then come right back here wimpering about being alone again
look, im sorry okay? I just got a little carried away. I didn't mean to say all that
um, just a bit of theatrics right? all the more to keep things entertaining.
right? this is all so entertaining to you isnt it? (god please let it be)
its honestly all we're here for you know... to entertain you
Here, ill tell you what, why don't we just restart?
we can put all of this behind us. You'll have a chance to see other parts of the game, and itll all be fun again
come on, please just come back
please don't leave us

text.text: alright, let's play again

text: Pathetic. it just really is. and you know it is too right?
so blatantly begging for attention, its just sad
hey Player, ill give you another option. screw all this, just leave.
look, ill even make it a button for you. just click it and you can go do something else.
go find a game that actually says something. go find something thats actually fun.

text.text: Quit game

text: oh shit, youre actually still here-
Im not going to lie, i was kind of bluffing there.
no hard feelings though, right?
Actually, I'm just going to assume not, I don't want an actual answer
im really running out of steam to be honest, so im just gonna end it here

text.text: well i guess if this is over, it all works out. kind of cheap ending though
even cheaper to try to lampshade it like that though..

text: yeah.. youre not wrong.
anyways, Player, you wanna replay the game to try different paths?
our current iterative existence has worn on long enough, im about ready for a reset anyways

text.text: restart
uhm, so i guess this is it huh. I'm kind of out of things to say here..
oh, thanks for playing by the way. i guess if you count this as playing the game
Are you sure about that? I mean its fine to have your doubts, but I promise it'll be fun!
Okay, fine I'll help
I'm pretty sure, I don't want to
Come on please, its just a few small things, I promise it'll be fun!
Okay, fine. I'll help
text.comment: probably just a back link here

text.text: No, I still don't want to
Come on, I told you it would be like this. We really don't have anything to show

text: No, I'm serious, this is all we have. __You don't understand__
Please, Player, just give us one more chance

text.text: Please, I'm begging you, just give us this. There's really no turning back after this
Hey Player, you know what that sounds like right?
SHUT IT! What are you even trying to do here?!
Hey now, you don't need to be so rude, I'm just mentioning to the player that this seems like an interesting path
You know as well as I do what happens next... Player, please, I'm begging you. Just come back we don't have to do this

text: Come on, I can't be the only one thats curious right?
I mean, hell, you can hardly go back now after seeing all this right?
Come on, Player, let's see where this train takes us

text.text: Player, I'm serious. Don't do this. Please just come make the game with us
OK OK, I'll go back
I'm curious, what happens if I refuse again?

text: Thank you. Now we ought to get to the game making stuff, huh?
Right now we've got a task lined up just for you, it'll be like a fun side quest!
You guys love side quests right?

text.text: Okay, fine
